LanguageData.Misc_Beehive.label: beehive
LanguageData.Misc_Beehive.description: This is an enclosed structure where some honey bees live and raise their young. Your colonists can harvest their honey.
LanguageData.Honey.label: honey
LanguageData.Honey.description: A delicious sweet from our friend the bee.
LanguageData.HoneycombWithQueen.label: Honeycomb w. Queen
LanguageData.HoneycombWithQueen.description:
A honeycomb with a living queen bee. You can place it inside a bee house and she will build up her beehive.

Caution:
-You only have a limited time to build a hive for your queen or she'll vanish.
-The queen will die if the outside temperature is too hot or too cold.
LanguageData.UnfinishedHoneycomb.label: unfinished honeycomb
LanguageData.TreeBeeHive.label: hollow tree
LanguageData.TreeBeeHive.description: An old hollow tree containing a wild beehive.
